content: hey guys Adam Scottie here I'm excited to announce what the adventure project
is going to be the adventure project is going to be an uncharted island and just
what fun can that you know just thick conjure what fun that can be the goal
will be for the players they're going to shipwreck on the island which is the
classic RPG thing so it's fun too so when they shipwreck on the island their
goal will be to either just get off the island which is pretty fun so they can
you know try to figure out how to get it get away or you know they may stay on
the island that'll know so after they explored so we'll house have to see how
that goes but just some great environments and dinosaurs I love
dinosaurs I agree I never get to use dinosaurs great environments dinosaurs
you know lost civilizations it's just going to be fantastic so anyways the the
place is going to be called far land okay I'll fart Isle far land after my
last name MacFarlane and no one's really explored the island it's cartographers
have kind of mapped out the edge of the island but there's some pretty high
cliffs around the edge of the island and so it's hard to scale so no one's really
gone in the interior of the island the only thing that the cartographers really
know is that there's a volcano I mean they can see the plume coming up from
the island so that's really know anything they know about the island so
that's fun it's a totally open slate for you know what the GM wants to do but my
first project is going to be crafting the shipwreck I'm going to have the
players wash up on the beach and I want to have parts of the ship on the beach
and I think that'll be really cool to craft so my next video in the adventure
project series is actually crafting the ship remains the shipwreck pieces for
the beach so I hope to see you there and I'll see you next time on
craft adventure project
